title: 22 - There's No Such Thing as a Soulmate
description:
In this episode we blow up the myth of a soulmate.  Where did we come up with this crazy idea? It's not in the Bible. So, why has the idea of the "one just specifically designed for you" idea, permeated and driven our culture to believe such a lie?  We also expose some sinful behavior, and Justin Beiber is to blame.

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
